chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
lmi: log_matching_interface
si: sorted_interface
aemi: applied_entries_monotonic_interface
smsi: state_machine_safety_interface
misi: max_index_sanity_interface
smci: state_machine_correct_interface
lacimi: lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface

Goal:
forall e : entry, has_key (eClient e) (eId e) e = true

Premises:
eClient = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, eClient, _, _, _, _) := e in eClient : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> clientId Arguments eClient {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
has_key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (c : clientId) (i : nat) (e : entry) => match e with | {| eClient := c'; eId := i' |} => (if clientId_eq_dec c c' then true else false) && (i =? i') end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> entry -> bool Arguments has_key {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
eId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, eId, _, _, _) := e in eId : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> nat Arguments eId {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
deduplicate_log' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix deduplicate_log' (log : list entry) (ks : list (clientId * nat)) {struct log} : list entry := match log with | [] => [] | e :: es => match assoc clientId_eq_dec ks (eClient e) with | Some n => if n <? eId e then e :: deduplicate_log' es (assoc_set clientId_eq_dec ks (eClient e) (eId e)) else deduplicate_log' es ks | None => e :: deduplicate_log' es (assoc_set clientId_eq_dec ks (eClient e) (eId e)) end end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list (clientId * nat) -> list entry Arguments deduplicate_log' {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope
applyEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix applyEntries (h : name) (st : raft_data) (entries : list entry) {struct entries} : list raft_output * raft_data := match entries with | [] => ([], st) | e :: es => let (out, st0) := cacheApplyEntry st e in let out0 := if name_eq_dec (eAt e) h then map (fun o : output => ClientResponse (eClient e) (eId e) o) out else [] in let (out', state) := applyEntries h st0 es in (out0 ++ out', state) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list raft_output * raft_data Arguments applyEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _ _%list_scope
contiguous_range_exact_lo = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (xs : list entry) (lo : nat) => (forall i : nat, lo < i <= maxIndex xs -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e xs) /\ (forall e : entry, In e xs -> lo < eIndex e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> nat -> Prop Arguments contiguous_range_exact_lo {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope _%nat_scope
client_cache_complete = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (removeAfterIndex (log (nwState net h)) (lastApplied (nwState net h))) -> exists (id : nat) (o : output), getLastId (nwState net h) (eClient e) = Some (id, o) /\ eId e <= id : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments client_cache_complete {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
cacheApplyEntry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) => match getLastId st (eClient e) with | Some (id, o) => if eId e <? id then ([], st) else if eId e =? id then ([o], st) else applyEntry st e | None => applyEntry st e end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> entry -> list output * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output Arguments cacheApplyEntry {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
applyEntry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) => let (out, d) := handler (eInput e) (stateMachine st) in ([out], RaftState.set_raft_data_stateMachine term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_clientCache term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output st (assoc_set clientId_eq_dec (clientCache st) (eClient e) (eId e, out))) d) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list output * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output Arguments applyEntry {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
thing : forall (es l l' : list entry) (e e' : entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' 0 -> entries_match l l' -> es <> [] -> Prefix es l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo es (eIndex e) -> In e l -> In e' l' -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> es ++ removeAfterIndex l (eIndex e) = l'
key_of = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => (eClient e, eId e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> clientId * nat Arguments key_of {orig_base_params raft_params}
log_matching_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit ->...-> Prop Arguments log_matching_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
removeAfterIndex_same_sufficient : forall (x : nat) (l l' : list entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l -> In e l') -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l' -> In e l) -> removeAfterIndex l' x = removeAfterIndex l x
Bool.diff_false_true = fun H : false = true => let H0 : False := eq_ind false (fun e : bool => if e then False else True) I true H in False_ind False H0 : false <> true
entries_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (entries entries' : list entry) => forall e e' e'' : entry, eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e entries -> In e' entries' -> eIndex e'' <= eIndex e -> In e'' entries < -> In e'' entries' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments entries_match {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope
log_matching_hosts = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => (forall h h' : Net.name, entries_match (log (nwState net h)) (log (nwState net h'))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (i : nat), 1 <= i <= maxIndex (log (nwState net h)) -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e (log (nwState net h))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eIndex e > 0) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments log_matching_hosts {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
state_machine_safety_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (e e' : entry), commit_recorded net h e -> commit_recorded net h' e' -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> e = e' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments state_machine_safety_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
state_machine_safety_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> t >= currentTerm (nwState net h) -> commit_recorded net h e ->...-> Prop Arguments state_machine_safety_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix sorted (log : list entry) : Prop := match log with | [] => True | e :: es => (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eIndex e > eIndex e' /\ eTerm e >= eTerm e') /\ sorted es end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments sorted {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
execute_log' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix execute_log' (log : list entry) (st : data) (l : list (input * output)) {struct log} : list (input * output) * data := match log with | [] => (l, st) | e :: log' => let '(o, st') := handler (eInput e) st in execute_log' log' st' (l ++ [(eInput e, o)]) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> data -> list (input * output) -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope _ _%list_scope
lastApplied_lastApplied_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (e : entry), lastApplied (nwState net h') <= lastApplied (nwState net h) -> eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h') -> In e (log (nwState net h')) < -> In e (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments lastApplied_lastApplied_match {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
commitIndex_lastApplied_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (e : entry), commitIndex (nwState net h') <= lastApplied (nwState net h) -> eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h') -> In e (log (nwState net h')) < -> In e (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments commitIndex_lastApplied_match {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lastApplied_commitIndex_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (e : entry), lastApplied (nwState net h') <= commitIndex (nwState net h) -> eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h') -> In e (log (nwState net h')) < -> In e (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments lastApplied_commitIndex_match {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') = Some (eInput e, out) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, clientId -> nat -> output -> list entry -> Prop Arguments output_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
removeIncorrect_new_contiguous : forall (new current : list entry) (prev : nat) (e : entry), sorted current -> uniqueIndices current -> (forall e0 e' : entry, eIndex e0 = eIndex e' -> eTerm e0 = eTerm e' -> In e0 new -> In e' current -> e0 = e') -> contiguous_range_exact_lo current 0 -> contiguous_range_exact_lo new prev -> In e current -> eIndex e = prev -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (new ++ removeAfterIndex current prev) 0
packets_gt_prevIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eIndex e > pli : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_gt_prevIndex {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
packets_ge_prevTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eTerm e >= plt : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_ge_prevTerm {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
maxIndex_removeAfterIndex : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e = i -> maxIndex (removeAfterIndex l i) = i
Record applied_entries_monotonic_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_applied_entries_monotonic_interface { applied_entries_monotonic' : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (os : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') os ->...-> In e (applied_entries (nwState net')) } Arguments applied_entries_monotonic_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_applied_entries_monotonic_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
maxIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxIndex (entries : list entry) : logIndex := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eIndex e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex Arguments maxIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Bool.absurd_eq_true : forall b : bool, False -> b = true
removeAfterIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix removeAfterIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if eIndex e <=? i then e :: es else removeAfterIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments removeAfterIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
